content.query:
SELECT 
o.customeridname
, o.estimatedclosedate
, o.name
, o.description
, o.stepname
, o.emailaddress
, o.parentcontactidname
, o.closeprobability
, t.total_amount
 FROM [dataverse_salestrial_unq3d4075f3478b43c8b0ce820555ec9].[dbo].[opportunity] o
 INNER JOIN [NYC].[dbo].[NYCTripSmall] t ON o.opportunityratingcode = t.payment_type
